DOC.HEADLINE: ' 93 / ' 94 YEAR-END REVIEW AND OUTLOOK ; INDUSTRY OUTLOOK ; CONTINUING LOW-GRADE GROWTH IN THE NATIONAL ECONOMY , COUPLED WITH HOPES FOR STABILITY -- IF NOT EXPANSION -- IN CALIFORNIA , IS THE BACKDROP FOR THE YEAR IN BUSINESS . HERE IS AN ASSESSMENT OF KEY INDUSTRIES ' PROSPECTS .
DOC.TEXT: MOVIES : A robust overseas market , generating twice the revenue of domestic box-office for some hit movies , will play a starring role in what should be a good year for the film_industry . Hollywood will continue to learn tough lessons in taming big budgets . KATHRYN HARRIS
